/* WtrSourMap.SelectWtrSourList 수원지 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_HEAD_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.HEA_NAM LIKE '%' || #HEA_NAM# || '%'
A.WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE#
A.IRV_NAM LIKE '%' || #IRV_NAM# || '%'
A.RSV_VOL = #RSV_VOL#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.FNS_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.FNS_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS FNS_YMD , A.HEA_NAM , A.WSR_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250058' AND DTL_CD = A.WSR_CDE ) AS WSR_NAM , A.IRV_NAM , A.RSV_VOL , A.RSV_ARA , A.FUL_ARA , A.THR_WAL , A.HTH_WAL , A.AVG_WAL , A.DRA_WAL , A.HDR_WAL , A.KEE_WAL , A.GUA_ARA , A.GUA_POP , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_HEAD_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.HEA_NAM LIKE '%' || #HEA_NAM# || '%'
A.WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE#
A.IRV_NAM LIKE '%' || #IRV_NAM# || '%'
A.RSV_VOL = #RSV_VOL#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* WtrSourMap.SelectWtrSourDtl 수원지 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , a.FNS_YMD , A.HEA_NAM , A.WSR_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250058' AND DTL_CD = A.WSR_CDE ) AS WSR_NAM , A.IRV_NAM , A.RSV_VOL , A.RSV_ARA , A.FUL_ARA , A.THR_WAL , A.HTH_WAL , A.AVG_WAL , A.DRA_WAL , A.HDR_WAL , A.KEE_WAL , A.GUA_ARA , A.GUA_POP , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_HEAD_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_HEAD_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , FNS_YMD , HEA_NAM , WSR_CDE , IRV_NAM , RSV_VOL , RSV_ARA , FUL_ARA , THR_WAL , HTH_WAL , AVG_WAL , DRA_WAL , HDR_WAL , KEE_WAL , GUA_ARA , GUA_POP , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #FNS_YMD# , #HEA_NAM# , #WSR_CDE# , #IRV_NAM# , #RSV_VOL# , #RSV_ARA# , #FUL_ARA# , #THR_WAL# , #HTH_WAL# , #AVG_WAL# , #DRA_WAL# , #HDR_WAL# , #KEE_WAL# , #GUA_ARA# , #GUA_POP# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# )

/* 수원지 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_HEAD_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , FNS_YMD = #FNS_YMD# , HEA_NAM = #HEA_NAM# , WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE# , IRV_NAM = #IRV_NAM# , RSV_VOL = #RSV_VOL# , RSV_ARA = #RSV_ARA# , FUL_ARA = #FUL_ARA# , THR_WAL = #THR_WAL# , HTH_WAL = #HTH_WAL# , AVG_WAL = #AVG_WAL# , DRA_WAL = #DRA_WAL# , HDR_WAL = #HDR_WAL# , KEE_WAL = #KEE_WAL# , GUA_ARA = #GUA_ARA# , GUA_POP = #GUA_POP# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_HEAD_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , FNS_YMD = #FNS_YMD# , HEA_NAM = #HEA_NAM# , WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE# , IRV_NAM = #IRV_NAM# , RSV_VOL = #RSV_VOL# , RSV_ARA = #RSV_ARA# , FUL_ARA = #FUL_ARA# , THR_WAL = #THR_WAL# , HTH_WAL = #HTH_WAL# , AVG_WAL = #AVG_WAL# , DRA_WAL = #DRA_WAL# , HDR_WAL = #HDR_WAL# , KEE_WAL = #KEE_WAL# , GUA_ARA = #GUA_ARA# , GUA_POP = #GUA_POP# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , FNS_YMD , HEA_NAM , WSR_CDE , IRV_NAM , RSV_VOL , RSV_ARA , FUL_ARA , THR_WAL , HTH_WAL , AVG_WAL , DRA_WAL , HDR_WAL , KEE_WAL , GUA_ARA , GUA_POP , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #FNS_YMD# , #HEA_NAM# , #WSR_CDE# , #IRV_NAM# , #RSV_VOL# , #RSV_ARA# , #FUL_ARA# , #THR_WAL# , #HTH_WAL# , #AVG_WAL# , #DRA_WAL# , #HDR_WAL# , #KEE_WAL# , #GUA_ARA# , #GUA_POP# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# )
/* 수원지 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_HEAD_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
